about_the_game:
Karapath

Karapath is a tactical move-to-move-decision-heavy randomized puzzle-thinking rpg-themed game with gambling-based combat.

Features

  • Gambling combat - combat is decided automatically, you can only maximize your chances of winning
  • Map generation - maps are conceptually consistent while forbidding move memorization
  • Tactical focus - every move has considerable impact towards the outcome of your game
  • Deathsweeper - you can mitigate your bad luck using your logical thinking skills
  • Skillbuilding - explore a range of different chance modifying item combinations to find the best one
